item.description:
@pkatedge88 wrote:

im getting weird results with ::female
will someone help me?

if(command.startsWith("female")){ pBeard = 0; pHead = 45 + misc.random(10); pTorso = 56 + misc.random(4); pArms = 61 + misc.random(5); pHands = 67 +misc.random(2); pLegs = 70 + misc.random(8); pFeet = 79 +misc.random(2); pHairC = misc.random(5); pTorsoC = misc.random(5); pLegsC = misc.random(5); pFeetC = misc.random(5); pSkinC = misc.random(5); playerLook[0] = 0 + misc.random(5); playerLook[1] = 0 + misc.random(5); playerLook[2] = 0 + misc.random(5); playerLook[3] = 0 + misc.random(5); playerLook[4] = 0 + misc.random(5); playerLook[5] = 0 + misc.random(5); apset = true; pGender = 1;
